snippet.title: Down the Mountain 📸 A cozy photography game set on a mountain - Trailer
snippet.description:
Let's journey  down the mountain along a winding trail, enjoying the handcrafted sights and keeping an eye out for the animals calling this mountain their home. You have your camera with you, so have a fun and relaxing day exploring!

Play the game on itch.io! https://christinacreatesgames.itch.io/down-the-mountain

The game will fit into a relaxing evening and there are no spiders on the mountain :)
